docs.snippet: A family home where children and an extensive art collection can peacefully coexist....
docs.lead_paragraph: A family home where children and an extensive art collection can peacefully coexist.
docs.abstract: Clay and Tom Tarica live in 1950s ranch house in Larchmont, NY, along with their three children and extensive art collection; couple hired architect Andrew Bergman to redesign house so that their family and art could coexist peacefully.

docs.snippet: Muammar Gaddafi's son Saadi, his special forces commander who fled abroad during Libya's 2011 revolution, was imprisoned in Tripoli on Thursday after Niger agreed to send him back from house arrest there....
docs.lead_paragraph: Muammar Gaddafi's son Saadi, his special forces commander who fled abroad during Libya's 2011 revolution, was imprisoned in Tripoli on Thursday after Niger agreed to send him back from house arrest there.

headline.main: Niger Extradites Gaddafi's Son Saadi to Libya
